website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive jewelry case keeps gems organized and ready to wear.
pros: Hangs easily from a door or inside of a closet
Great option if you don't have a lot of extra space but need to store and organize a lot of jewelry
cons: Does not come with its own hanger

customer_reviews.title: No more tangled jewelry!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! The first pic is just a snippet of the mess in one of my many jewelry boxes-needless to say, having this organizer quickly solved that problem. One side has 32 pockets (image 2) that I put earrings, association pins, etc; while the other side has 18 Slots (image 3) that I put my neckwear in. This side uses velcro (image 4) to hang the necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: PheonixRN16

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom who has so much jewelry! Nice size pockets even fit bracelets or a few pairs of earrings. It nice, you flip it offer then, you can hang you necklaces or bracelets. This is great for your day-to-day necklaces you rotate. You hang it on a hanger making it flexible on where you can hang it! I have hangers with the hooks that rotate so, you can hang on the back of you door, cabinet, wherever! I'm going to buy one for myself. Now as I'm growing older, it seems I'm getting quite a collection of good jewelry. Wish there was a watch compartment tho. But I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer. I have now bought 2 of themes
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry organizer is great. I took pics showing how much of my jewelry it can hold comfortably. I have a heavy necklace and the Velcro is holding it firm. The pockets on the other side are generous. I’m actually purchasing another one today because I’m hanging up all my jewelry. It really was an immediate help to my organization.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. PoppeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Best Bow Organizer EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My girls have plenty of hair accessories and I wanted to organize them nearly where I can see them all. This organizer is perfect! It's sturdy and well made and holds over 100 accessories and the loops on the back are ideal for headbands. I slightly repurposed it but I love it and I've recommended it to at least a dozen friends who are happily bow organized as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily T.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for long necklaces, for day to day costume jewelry, and for beading
customer_reviews.text: I have had many jewelry boxes and for my good pieces I still use them. This this is ideal for my costume and day to day pieces. It is also a fantastic place for the jewelry I make. I do beading and this is perfect for my projects. Some of the necklaces are very long or complex and don't fit neatly inside standard jewelry boxes. This way I can hang them without them getting tangled. It also allows me to see all my pieces at once to decide which to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: The otger jewelry I have I don't wear often and I don't think the velcro tabs on the back side are long and sturdy enough. In ad
customer_reviews.text: It works well for the price and what I need it for. I put all my khemar/hijab pins in the pockets and my everyday khol, mascara and gloss. I also have my go to bangels in the pockets. The otger jewelry I have I don't wear often and I don't think the velcro tabs on the back side are long and sturdy enough. In addition I don't want the hassle of flipping it back and forth to get to the jewelry. It looks good hanging near my full body mirror and has kept my dresser clutter free thus far.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Loads of storage for trinkets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this organizer after it was recommended by a friend. It’s is handy, well made, has loads of storage to hold mine and my toddlers earrings, clips, head bands and more. There’s still more room and it’s easy as a pie to just insert a sturdy hanger onto the organizer and hang it where convenient. It’s just sensible to be able to find all your tiny stuff in one place, disentangled and clearly visible in their own pockets. The backside comes with velcro strips for necklaces or headbands. I’m very happy with my purchase and recommend everyone to buy one. Tip : you can also store piping tips, tiny gel color bottles, nail polish, sewing accessories, safety pins etc
customer_reviews.author: Zhill

customer_reviews.title: Organized My Necklaces In One Space
customer_reviews.text: Stores my necklace collection on one side and my bracelets on the other. This is hung on my bathroom door and the door is open and closed several times a day and this is as sturdy as can be. The Velcro necklace holders have about 3 necklaces each on them and they stay closed and secure all the time. I would recommend it to anyone who lives in a small area because it frees up all the space those jewelry boxes take up. All of a sudden it is like having new jewelry because now you can see it! I forgot about all the ones I had and never wore anymore.
customer_reviews.author: katlupe

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** Company reached out after my return and offered to replace both organizers with a different item at a truly unbelievable discount. Very happy with the new product and their terrific customer service! ORIGINAL: I can't find a hanger in the house that will fit inside. I ordered two and they're both being returned. No need to be snotty as one reviewer was about someone who encountered the same issue. It simply would not fit over a standard wire hanger, a flocked hanger, a small ladies' wooden hanger, OR any of the hangers from Kohls, Macys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: centralohiogal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought one about a month ago, I have liked it because it fit so many but the problem was that I wasn't able to use it on both side/ to heavy that that makes it bend and the jewelry falls out. I wrote a review saying that I am not fully satisfied since I can't use both side and that I will buy another one then the seller contacted me offered me a discounted code which helped me get the second one and use it that way I wanted. I am very satisfied with this purchase and I really appreciate the amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sukayna

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurately Potrayed
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company apologized for the misinterpretation & sent me a replacement organizer for free that had deeper pockets & more room for necklaces & bracelets. I didn’t request it so this was very thoughtful. I would purchase from them again I am updating my stars to a 4. It was not at all how it is made to look or described. It’s made to be hung on a hanger not really an item I would have got if I knew that & it’s thin. The pockets aren’t deep enough for anything besides small rings
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I like this hanging jewelry organizer very much. It holds just about all of what I have -- but I'm sure I have much less than a whole lot of other people. I use the little pockets more than the part where you hang necklaces. I would have preferred more pockets, but then I don't have lots of long necklaces. It does hang nicely , but of course doesn't come with the hanger. I doubt I would use it when traveling. I like to just take the things I'm sure I'll use. I don't really change what I wear all that often.
customer_reviews.author: BackHomeAgain

customer_reviews.title: Decent Jewelry Holder
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lots of space, nice material. Cons: The pockets are smaller than I thought, and if you have a lot of necklaces, you have to get a strong hanger because it will break. Overall, I do like the organizer. I don’t have much counter space, so having something in my closet is ideal for saving space.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Lots of loops and pockets of different sizes. Fits a standard hanger and blends in with other garments hanging in closet which sort of hides it. Easy to take in and out of the closet and clear pockets make it easy to find and replace your jewelry. Not great for traveling as it gets tangled with other items in garment bag and unless it is hanging, items can fall out of the pockets. For home use, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A2ZMD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jewelry holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a chest jewelry box that I no longer need and was surprised at how big this is! The stitching is nice, the pockets are generous, and it slips nicely over a hanger. Because it can hang between clothes it seems to almost be a safer location for jewelry. I think it would be a great holder for my granddaughters hair ribbons or play jewelry, too. This jewelry holder is a great value and versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is flimsy, lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: This particular jewelry holder does not come with a hanger at top, so I had to insert my own, no problem. The fabric seems to be lighter in weight than others I have had, so it is more fragile. I purchased it to insert jewelry that I am selling on-line, so I can easily find it instead of rummaging thru a box. So, in that respect, it works perfectly! It does the trick of what I originally ordered it for. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality; Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this jewelry holder. In fact, so satisfied I purchased 2! I like that they aren't too long. They take up little room and I am able to organize my jewelry better than ever. The pockets are large enough for bracelets and I like the velcro tabs that hold necklaces. Very happy with my purchase. I have had them for several months and they are really packed with jewelry...I definitely collect too much jewelry. These help me keep it visible and organized.
customer_reviews.author: TampaBay

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable enough. Not made for traveling, at least not in my opinion. Although I suppose it could be used in a larger suitcase if it is laid flat. There plenty of pockets for earrings and bracelets. I feel like there could be more for the necklaces. There are only 3 rows, I think 5 velcro loops on each row. It doesnt seem like you could hang multiple necklaces on one loop, of they were heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: I just filled two of these wth my jewelry and they seem great. They aren’t made out of the most durable material, but I’ve had a similar one for years and it’s been great. Also, the price on these is great! I only bought these because I outgrew the one I had and I’m tired of my necklaces getting all tangled up in the pockets. The loops on the back seem durable. There was only one necklace I didn’t hang because of the weight and it’s a really heavy necklace! I was worried about not getting hangers with them but I bought a pack at WM for less than $3 that work. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Williams

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: used these to replace a rather large jewelry box. Now they are taking up a very little bit of space in the closet and I can see what I have better. Forgot I had some of the stuff! They really do hold a lot
customer_reviews.author: Sby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of jewelry but have been buying a lot of Paparazzi earrings so I need to upgrade my jewelry holder. This was a great buy. It has a lot of spaces for different earrings, necklaces, and bracelets. If you want something a little more compact that'll just hang in your closet out of the way then I would completely recommend this. Will buy again if I run out of room!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Croft

customer_reviews.title: I find it very useful It is pretty well made and it does the ...
customer_reviews.text: I find it very useful It is pretty well made and it does the job. There are a few design problems that I see. if I were making it I would not use Velcro on the sides with the necklaces since they can, they don't always, cause entanglement. The side with the earrings sections if very handy definitely large enough for the earrings, in fact I have more than one in Most slots. Jewelry is visible and when it is full it has a nice weight which makes it feel more substantial. It is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: A few improvements neefec
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if the company put a hook or hanger on it. I don't think I will be using it for traveling but that's not to say it couldn't be. I just wouldn't recommend it since there is no way to secure your items. Maybe velcro on the pockets, then you could roll the necklaces on the inside & the pockets on the outside & not have to worry about losing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Cynderella1127

customer_reviews.title: ... this Jewelry organizer a few weeks ago & I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Jewelry organizer a few weeks ago & I love it!! The top cover in which the hanger goes into is awesome & very durable! I do not have to worry about my jewelry organizer falling to the floor such as other jewelry organizers with a velcro flap that is suppose to the bottom flat part of a hanger. A great amount of pockets for war rings, rings & bracelets & plenty of velcro hangings for necklaces which have proven to hold very well! Very satisfied customer here 😁👏🏽
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organization.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and now every girl in the family. It holds the necklaces in place without tangles and the earrings and rings securely in place. I use it daily. I thought it would be great for travel. It is still good but there is not a cover for the pockets, so if you don’t fold it right, things may slip out. Suggest tape or practice folding securely before traveling with it.
customer_reviews.author: TaintedOne

customer_reviews.title: Velcro loops, plenty of pockets, good customer service by seller
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item the description said "hook and loop closures". There are no hooks. There are indeed velcro loops to hang necklaces and bracelets by. I was looking for something that had hooks to easily hang and remove items from. There are a nice number of pockets on one side. This does not come with a hanger. Seller has very good communication and customer service and was quick to initiate a conversation and offer a resolution. Seller is 5-star by my experience.
customer_reviews.author: GLS323

customer_reviews.title: I have owned mine for 7 years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these 7 years ago. There is only one or two pouches that are loosing a bit of stitching. But, none of them are falling apart or dropping jewelry. In fact, I am buying another one today because I have run out of room. Even the velcro on the back is not worn out yet, which was the one thing I was most worried about. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Sudborough Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry organizer is truly amazing!!!! I love how it arrived immediately and the fact that there was no damage to the product. Not only that but the amount of pockets provided enough storage that I was finally able to get rid of my old jewelry box. The back part for hanging necklaces is a lifesaver!!!! I feel more organized and still have more open pockets to store more. If I knew this product was so great, I would have bought more and used it for other things like hair accessories or even store small things for personal care. Overall, I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I feel like your satisfaction with this product is all about expectations. It’s not made for traveling & it’s true that it won’t fit on every hanger (I had to try a couple different styles before I found one that worked). But, it functions just fine as a place to store my everyday/nothing special jewelry &, really, for the price, that’s good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sete Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: does exactly what it looks like
customer_reviews.text: This product functions exactly as expected. I will say that for smaller stud earrings it can be a bit challenging to dig them out of the pockets, but this is a very minor gripe. I'm living in a small apartment and don't have a lot of disposable surface area, so this fit the bill perfectly as far as storing my jewelry without taking up precious desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of each color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this organizer for my necklaces but it also works perfectly for my bracelets, pins, and larger earrings. The black background works best for silver and gold tone necklaces. The white background shows stone or bead necklaces best. A smaller, padded hanger inserted under the top flap holds the organizer well. The velcro holders are effective and easy to use. The see-through pockets are easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these organizers primarily for travel. They are light weight and without the hanger fold up nicely. I'm not sure the pockets for earrings and pendants are secure for travel, however. They are open at the top and may items to slip out. That remains to be seen, since I have not travelled with it yet. The hangers for necklaces are plentiful and very secure, the best solution I have seen to prevent necklaces from forming a giant tangled ball when stored together. I like the ability to hang the organizer with a hanger. I look forward to trying it on my next trip. I would recommend this organizer.
customer_reviews.author: ardel

customer_reviews.title: Best jewelry organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry organizer. I have it hanging behind a door, no one can tell that it’s there. I definitely thought I had more jewelry, but it’s super sturdy and a great steal for the price. I have it hanging with one of those plastic hangers from the store and then a command strip hook. I have no issues with the hook at all. The back of this has Velcro hooks for necklaces/bracelets. So far it seems to be strong but I’m not sure about heavier jewelry. You won’t regret buying !
customer_reviews.author: Megan Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Low quality and super small. I bought it for a gift for someone and ended up going somewhere and getting a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I was able to hang a bunch of necklaces on one side of the unit and on the other I filled the pockets with bracelets. I still have empty pockets that I could use for earrings or pins. I love how easy it is to see my jewelry so I can grab what I want quickly. This organizer keeps my necklaces from getting tangled which is also great. I have it hanging in my closet on a hook just inside the door. Perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good for Temporary Storage
customer_reviews.text: Our house will soon go on the market. I needed an organizer so I could store my jewelry in a gun safe while visitors are touring my house. This is not the highest quality item you'll find, but it was an inexpensive fix for storing multiple pairs of earrings and a number of bracelets and pins, along with chain drop and pearl necklaces. The item works just as shown in the photos. One side has plastic pockets for small items like earrings and rings, while the other side has 3 rows of Velcro loops to hold necklaces and bracelets separately to keep them from tangling. There is a sleeve pocket for a coat hanger at the top of the organizer.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I have far too much jewelry. Because so much was gifted to me ,I have a difficult time giving it away or donating it. I needed to find a better way to access it. This organizer has done just that. I hung it from a hook on my bathroom door. Everything is visible and easily accessible from there. I ordered two of the organizers intending to gift one of them but I find I need both. The package was delivered on time in excellent condition. I will recommend this product to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jarrells

customer_reviews.title: I debated on a jewelry box but I don't have much space to put one on plus I really wanted to be able to see what I am looking for easily. This is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I desperately needed something to put my jewelry in. I debated on a jewelry box but I don't have much space to put one on plus I really wanted to be able to see what I am looking for easily. This is perfect! It just hangs in my closet with my clothes so I can easily pick my accessories and it doesn't take up much room at all. I have a lot of long necklaces and they hang fine in this.
customer_reviews.author: KayFave

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiding jewelry addiction from husband LOL
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to store several jewelry items out of sight from my husband. It is very discreet when hung in between clothing items in the wardrobe. It is very good quality. The price is great for what it is. I have already filled the first and ordered a second. No need for a jewelry box when you can purchase something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I have many different items to store my jewelry but this by far is my favorite. The reason is that I can also store necklaces by hanging them so they don’t tangle and store earrings that go with those necklaces in the same place. Love this as it takes up so much less space than it does in my drawer and everything is so easy to find. Loved it so much I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Untangling!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this item! I was so sick and tired of detangling my necklaces and searching for matching items like earrings and bracelets. With the Misslo Jewelry Hanger, everything is organized. I hang necklaces from the front by the velcro. On the back I can organize earrings, bracelets and rings by placing them in pouches. The organizer is hanging in my clothes closet, and it takes up very little space. I love it when I find a product that makes life easier at such a great price! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: abanana

customer_reviews.title: I loaded it up - so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: It works just as advertised. It would be nice to have bigger pockets for bracelets and larger earrings. I'm not sure how long the velcro straps will continue to stick with daily use (removing jewelry and replacing it later), so I may update my review after using it for a few more months. It was reasonably priced and is definitely doing the job for now. I just grabbed a plastic hanger, and it fit and works just fine. Thank you for helping me organize my costume jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to organize jewelry, but a few drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this organizer keeps all of my jewelry visible and accessible. I found a lot of pieces I had forgotten or thought were lost. I don't especially like the way my necklaces hang in the organizer. They are held by velcro loops, which does make them accessible, but also makes them hang free. One necklace scratched the wall behind it when I hung it in place. Also, I have many long necklaces that hang awkwardly below the organizer. This is very functional, but not very attractive or decorative. Good function for the price. Edited to add another star to this product because of the seller's outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: i love this jewelry organizer. i bought it specifically because it has both pockets and necklace loops. in my old organizer, my necklaces kept getting tangled in the pockets. it's exactly what i needed. the only thing i'd change is i wish it came with it's own hanger that fit it perfectly. i felt a standard plastic hanger didn't fit it perfectly. i ended up ripping the hanger out of my old jewelry organizer and using that.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: I love that this can hang in my closet
customer_reviews.text: I love that this can hang in my closet, out of the way. I slipped a plastic hanger through the top flap to hang it up. I also love the individual pockets for earrings - I don't have to spend time taking the backs of the earrings on and off to attach them to some other organizer. There are plenty of pockets and Velcro strips on the backs for necklaces. So far, my cat's haven't messed with it - thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Soccerlaf09

customer_reviews.title: jewelry
customer_reviews.text: have gone from a fancy box to an Acrylic box then after this move tried this method of placing my jewelry .. this works best for me .. keeps my chains from tangling .. plenty of room for my pendants .. my bracelets and my rings .. everything is right where i can see them.. and all hung vertically so nothing taking space on the counter.. to have to move to clean or to pick up dust ...
customer_reviews.author: katherine wright

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, but great utility
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really love the quality or the color options. I ordered the white one and it has black borders, and it looks very ugly. I wish they made different color options. But yes, gets the job done. Stores a lot of earrings and necklaces, and hanging it in the closet is the easiest. I’m assuming it would do pretty well during travel also.
customer_reviews.author: Kalmah666

customer_reviews.title: Not for traveling but fine at home
customer_reviews.text: This hanging jewelry bag is great for using at home. I would not suggest it for traveling because the section for earrings would spill. The individual compartments for rings or earrings don’t close. You just sit your jewelry in it. The necklace storage section has Velcro to keep the necklaces in place, but the other side doesn’t close fully. If you wanted to travel with this you would have to tape the sections closed. Too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Neysa

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this jewelry hanger for my necklaces, bracelets, watches, and large earings. It's been working so well! The velcro straps are strong. I like how the evenly the velcro straps are spaced, I can see all my necklaces well. The clear pockets are great, they hold all my stuff and keeps it organized and off my dresser. The hanger slot holds a universal hanger and it fit in very well. The organizer is pretty heavy when loaded with necklaces so I found my strongest plastic hanger to use for this, making sure it would not bend from the weight. Working great!
customer_reviews.author: Liisa Davila

customer_reviews.title: It does the job of organizing
customer_reviews.text: I had some jewelry that was just over flowing out of my little jewelry chest. So, I bought this to organize some newly acquired pieces. It works well for that. It doesn't really secure pieces for the slots. I wouldn't recommend it for use with traveling. I hang mine on the closet door for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hamala

customer_reviews.title: Great Jewelry Organizer
customer_reviews.text: As I've recently purchased more jewelry, I realized I needed a better storage/organization system. I found this and it works PERFECTLY! I can see EVERYTHING as I have this hanging on my closet door. With 2 of these hanging in my closet, I'm able to coordinate my outfits daily and save so MUCH time in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a travel organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I could use it to travel for my necklaces so they wouldn't get tangled up but not what I was looking for it doesn't fold and seal like I thought and it's front and back not sure by side. Not anything like what I needed but would cost just as much to return it so I guess I'll research better next time
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. It’s perfect. I can keep each piece of jewelry separate instead of rummaging around in a box. All my necklaces are hanging on the reverse side. Put a hanger into the top of it and hung it on the back of my bedroom door. Will more than likely buy a couple as gifts and another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I decided to do away with my jewelry armoire due to its size and condition. I really like using this product because it makes wearing jewelry more than an afterthought since it is always within view. It is not all that stable but because of its heaviness but as the jewelry within is secure, I am not concerned. It was so handy that I purchased another one to keep from overloading this one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have not bought this, you are missing out. It displays all my jewelry in such an organized way. Plus it is slim, light and easy to store. Best of all it's meant to be hung so you can put it right next to all your clothes in your closet. It does not come with a hanger but for the price I am sure no one minds using one of their own hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Clean and Absolutely Brilliant Design...Works Like A Charm (Bracelet)☺!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply a brilliant way to organize long necklaces and chunky bracelets on one side and tons of earring on the other!! I wish I had discovered this years ago! Mine is going to look almost exactly like the advertised photo when I finish putting everything together! AND, the velcro tabs are so strong, you can accidentally drop it, like I just did, and the necklaces stay in place!! I love this so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: summersky51

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: For a very affordable price, I was able to easily use a normal clothes hanger to hang this in my closet for easy viewing. Now as I am picking out my clothes for the day I can see ALL my earrings, bracelets, watches, rings, necklace, etc. I am amazed at how organized and neat everything looks! I find myself wearing more of jewelry I forgot I even had. Pro tip- I used one of the little pouches to put all the backs to my earrings. That way I pick out earrings and pick the best-suited backs to them and I'm on my way. GREAT product! Looks cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great organization -so glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple months & am loving it! I have always needed a better way to store & organize my earrings but I don't have the space on a dresser or in the bathroom for a standing jewelry tree or box etc. This truly solved my problems! I love the black because I can see my pieces and it hangs nicely in my closet and does not feel like a nuissance. Plus, I don't lose earrings anymore because I put them away immediately in their cute little slot. I recommended this to my sister in laws just because it bettered my life & thought it might better theirs as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described, Velcro loops on one side and clear pockets on the other side. I like that it came in a color (pink) other than black. It works as designed. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the hanger does not quite fit. I couldn't fit one of my plastic hangers in, so I had to use a wire hanger and bend it slightly. Not the end of the world. It still works fine, just hangs a little crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and purchase.👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Am delighted I bought this jewelry organizer. Affordable! Fantastic storage. My favorite part being the section for organizing my necklaces as they were always getting tangled up. Will be traveling with it also and God’s up so easy. Great product! I highly recommend you purchase and company that Make it had wonderful customer service. Two thumbs up and five stars. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item. My friend happened to order one from a noted jewelry place and got hers the same day. I have to say mine is better. I love how it hangs in the closet and I can easily see the items and get the one I want to wear that day. Its nice to have since my old way of leaving jewelry all over the place wasn't a good practice. Its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of space for all of my costume jewelry, so decided to get this for extra storage. The velcro to hang the necklaces is very strong, I was even able to hang two necklaces on one spot! The pockets for the earings are a great size and easily fits multiple pairs in one pocket. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: KEEPER
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for a whole now and I just love it. It makes sense that I would choose my clothes and accessories all in one spot in the closet and this thing does wonders. It's helped me keep dozens of rings, bracelets, anklets, earrings, and even hair band in check. It's so multi functional and even allowed me to store extra shoe laces on the back. In. Love.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent jewelry organizer that hangs nicely in your closet. Great size and compartments. I love the velcro "hooks" for necklaces. They are spaced out nicely and do not get tangled. So glad I made this purchase to neatly organize jewelry while keeping it in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Younggren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This holds a lot of my jewelry and its an excellent space saver. I used a regular size clothes hanger and it fits well, not sure why others said they had a problem with one not fitting. I'm very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this organizer for all your jewelry needs. ☺
customer_reviews.author: R1198

customer_reviews.title: Simple But Should Work
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was longer, but guess I read wrong. Will work and keep my cheap costume jewelry separated for easy access. I got too many pieces lately and had no storage for all of it. Material is cheap and may tear in the future, so I will have to be careful of how I put items in it and remove items from it too. Otherwise it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Holds a decent amount
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of having an old jewelry box and/or my jewelry laying in random spots. This was extremely affordable and holds quite a bit! I wouldn't recommend using it for traveling as jewelry slides out of the pouches pretty easily. I love the option of hanging my bracelets and necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: R. Whitacre

customer_reviews.title: Saves counter space
customer_reviews.text: I’ve basically run out of counter space in my apartment so this jewelry holder has been a lifesaver! It fits all my necklaces, bracelets and earrings and I’ve hung it up in the front of my closet for easy access. It keeps everything from getting tangled while saving valuable space. Great buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Vim N

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and great organization – a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jewelry organizer that would get my jewelry off my dresser. This one holds a large amount of jewelry and I can hang it in the closet. I’m able to see all the jewelry I have so I don’t have to dig through a box or a drawer. That really works great! It’s very sturdy comes with its own hanger, and holds a lot of weight. I’ve seen other hangers like this and I feel like this one organizes it really well with necklaces on one side and little pouches for earrings and rings on the other side. I have some pretty heavy necklaces and it was still able to hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi Koushik

customer_reviews.title: Tons of pockets
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry organizer has tons of pockets. I love it. I can put my earrings each pair in a separate pocket and still have room for bracelets and necklaces and rings. Perfect for if you need to save space or dont have a jewelry box. It hangs right up out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Black

customer_reviews.title: This has really helped me stay organized
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have a place to put my jewelry it helps me stay so much more organized. to be honest I only really use the velcro side. I don't know what you really would use the pocket side for? I don't wear earrings so maybe that's what people use it for. The pockets aren't convenient for rings and too small for bracelets. I think a helpful addition would be if the hanger could swivel.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Scattered no more.
customer_reviews.text: I do not have my jewlery scattered all over now! The pockets seem very sturdy and easy to get the pieces in and out. On the reverse side I have some of my stainless steel and sterling pieces hanging up and they are heavy and have not fallen off. I used a hanger with a rotating hook on it so is easy to flip from each side.
customer_reviews.author: ptlab

customer_reviews.title: This is greeeeeeaaaaat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item it really holds a lot of jewelry I like it but the only downside is that if you are traveling and you fold this in your bag or luggage all earrings,bracelets and ring will fall off because it doesn't have anything to close or sealed the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Dirna Rivera Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for long necklaces!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry organizer is a dream! I have many long necklaces that are no longer tangled in a jewelry box, and when I want to choose one, I simply take this out of the closet, and I can see them all easily. The Velcro straps that hold each one are solid and long enough to hold the necklaces securely. I will eventually move some of my earrings and such into the pouches, but for now, it has solved a huge problem for me!
customer_reviews.author: Chinya

customer_reviews.title: Great to organize jewelry and store in the closet
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the hanging feature for my closet is a great way to be able to find jewelry easily to accessorize with my outfits. The hanger blends in with my other clothes, which I feel is an added security bonus. The clear packets on one side is great for jewelry sets, earrings, necklaces, bracelets, rings, etc. the reverse side holds necklaces on velcro straps. The product is sturdy and attractive, easy to use and makes jewelry easy to find. I bought this two years ago, and am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good but could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: I used it while moving. Wish the pockets closed or at least had a flap so stuff didn't fall out when you bend it to roll it up. Wish it had more space between rows for necklaces. I have many longer necklaces than hung down into the row of necklaces below which I hope don't get tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Scarletrae

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty handy item. I hang it in my closet, it’s out-of-the-way... no clutter on my dresser, I like it. I haven’t used it for travel. I’m not sure how that would work out because the packets are open maybe another reviewer can answer that
customer_reviews.author: Shopping fan

customer_reviews.title: I wear more jewelry now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry organizer. I can see all my pieces of jewelry and they are easy and accessible to get to. I'm wearing jewelry that I haven't seen in years because it was wrapped up in felt bags. The organizer is simple and keeps jewelry from tangling. It hangs in my closet so when I'm getting ready I put on a necklace or earrings to go with my outfit. If you wear the same stuff everyday because you just forget about jewelry, like me, I would recommend buying this. Its fun again to be girly.
customer_reviews.author: K. D

customer_reviews.title: Only one side useable at a time
customer_reviews.text: This is a front/back construction, so when hung on the wall, the back side is unusable. A bit more cheaply made than what I expected. I did keep it, though;?and I’m using the side for the necklaces. It’s functional but I’m a bit disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon/LasVegas,NV

customer_reviews.title: Well made, holds a lot, great deal
customer_reviews.text: Well made, pockets are deep enough I dont worry about rings or earrings falling out. Doesn't take up a lot of room in my closet. Bought one for my daughter she loves it too. The only thing I would like to see different is much bigger pockets for storing cuff type bracelets. Update I now have 4 of thsse and I reccomend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Sharilyn Fotiathis

customer_reviews.title: Very good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I have many rings and earrings and all fit inside the pockets very nicely. I was worried on the backside about a heavy necklace I have and it not being able to be held up, surprisingly it does and I’m very excited that my more than overflowing jewelry box nightmare is no more.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsylizz

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This hanging jewelry sorter was just what I was looking for. It has plenty of pockets for bracelets and large earrings as well as many loops for necklaces on the back. I love being able to quickly find the jewelry I want to wear. Moreover I appreciate that I don’t have to find floor space to place a jewelry box in my condo. This easily takes a spot next to my dresses in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Super strong Velcro- better than full length wooden storage
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to those full length wooden jewelry storage pieces. I’m 66 year old gram with lots of fun pieces - I love how I can see my necklaces and earrings - the Velcro is super strong - even my chunkiest pieces stay in place. I group my lighter chains together on one Velcro strap - can see lengths and decide which length goes with the piece and outfit. Have 4 total. And can see everything.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lingenfelter

customer_reviews.title: was almost perfect except the velcro being in line so things may ...
customer_reviews.text: was almost perfect except the velcro being in line so things may get tangled being that I have very long chains attached. I used the over high part that covers the hangers to stick long dangle earnings and it works pretty cool, also some of the slots I could fit jewellery boxes (the ones that you get from the store with your jewellery in) in side so little nob Earings can be compiled and organised. nice product overall SUGGEDTION TO MANUFACTURER- alternate the velcro stripes in echo row so chains are not overlapping
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Trouble22

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST!!! I have not liked any of the other jewelry boxes I have ever owned. This one is simple and shows me everything I have at once. I hang it in my closet next to a little dresser and mirror I have in there. I may buy another one as I have filled this one and still have more jewelry to put in. It is a must to use a hanger that spins. This is much less expensive than other jewelry boxes, but much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Save space and time.
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something that works perfectly for me. No more piles in my drawers! I organized all my jewelry in about 30 minutes between two of these with space left over. Now I have the exact spots to store something and then put it back there. I like how the necklaces and bracelets hang. Easy on and off with Velcro. Saves space too bc I hang it in my closet. Saves time bc I pick my jewelry while I’m picking out my clothes. I just need to put a mirror in my closet too. It’s a walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to unscramble my jewelry . I can never find what I’m looking for this did the trick . Inexpensive way to organize what I have and be able to see everything at a glance. I tended to wear the same thing all the time because it was easier than looking for a piece . Not fancy but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Find in a flash!
customer_reviews.text: I love seeing my jewelry at a glance and being able to chose and get to them all easily without tangling. I have sorted by type and color so I can coordinate with my mood for the day in a flash. Now I can locate and see all of my favorites to not miss out on any of them. My life has more variety instead of the same old easy to find pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Pearlyharbor

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store my little girls' hair ties, bows, etc. I think the clear plastic pouches will work well to hold and see rubber bands, and the straps on the other side might work for clips. Hangs with a regular hanger, so I will just need a small nail in the bathroom to hang it on, as there isn't a closet in the kids' bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane W.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not my ideal jewelry organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective jewelry organizer but I am struggling to figure out where to store it so that I can see and easily access both sides as well as not take up too much space. Right now, I hang it against a wall but I don't like that I'm not able to see the side against the wall unless I flip it (I usually don't wear jewelry that I don't see).
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Hangs above my clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Hangs above my clothes in the closet, so can't be hidden in the clothes. I have another one ia got from Macys that hangs even with clothes and is hidden so can't be easily seen. Safe guard for jewelry when not at home. Otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: nancy babcock

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bigger organizer for jewelry. This works great as far as compartments, and necklace hanging . The fabric is not quality but you get what you pay for. It is convenient and practical. I would order it again. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Keri EB

customer_reviews.title: Durable and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars if the earring compartments had zippers to lock the earrings in. My mistake for not seeing it didn't, but I use this product everyday when choosing jewelry to wear for work. Well worth the price !
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: see through storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I knew I'd be traveling and I wanted to be able to organize my earrings and to see them at a glance. So far I'm pleased. I've been away for a couple of weeks and I have all my earrings hanging and they're easy to see and access. I t might be helpful to have a little Velcro tab so they don't fall out when you fold or roll it to put it in your suitcase. I had some earring fall out.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie daughtrey

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it but earring pockets have no closure.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it hangs on a hanger. Hides in your closet. Holds a fair amount. However, the side that holds small items has too many pockets and they are subsequently too shallow to feel secure. There are no closures on these small pockets and items could fall out if traveling with this.
customer_reviews.author: Covid Quarantiner

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am in absolute love with my Jewelry Hanger! I have sooo much jewelry I have collected over the past year, and I honestly can say I don't know where it all went, but I can now find pieces easier. Obviously wouldn't use for expensive jewelry, but my costume has a new home. :)
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot, condenses really well
customer_reviews.text: I do not see myself using this to travel because none of the clear pockets zip and it's also pretty big for a suitcase. Perfect because it holds a lot, stores well, and I can quickly see all my options and grab what I want. Now I don't have to dig for 2 minutes through drawers for studs, bracelets, and earrings. My jewelry selection takes 5 seconds. It feels like I've tripped my collection because I never forget what I have to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Storage Capacity
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry hanging organizer. It has enough room for all my everyday jewelry. Very convenient. It hangs in my closet so when I pick my outfit for the day, I can easily pick the jewelry that I want to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jewelry organizer. But I wish it came with its own hanger, I had to try whole bunch of hangers from my closet to find something that fits. Also I love the ring pockets. But I wish the necklace side has a clear protective cover to keep it dust free and prevent it from tarnish. I love silver jewelry but when exposed to air for long periods of time, it oxidizes.
customer_reviews.author: Bébé

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer, does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I originally pictured hanging this on a door, but it isn't secure enough for that--- it moves too much when loaded with jewelry and makes alot of noise. Instead I put a command hook on the bathroom wall and hung it from a hanger in there. It works well, I'm happy with it. Just needed to be in a location that didn't move frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K Anderson

product_meta.title: Misslo Jewelry Hanging Non-Woven Organizer Holder 32 Pockets 18 Hook and Loops - Black
feature_bullets: Dual sides jewelry carrier, 32 clear vinyl pockets and 18 hook and loops closures, perfect closet jewelry hanging organizer (Hanger not included);
Earring holder with Transparent PVC window, easily view and protect items, necklace loops tabs are strong enough to hold heavy chains;

Differ from messy jewelry boxes, the case display jewelry well and opening pockets for convenient to pick something to wear with an outfit, takes up just as much space as a shirt hanging in the closet would;
Visiable Jewelry door hanger, Approximately 30 3/4 inch H * 17 1/3 inch W, a hole on the top for hanger to go through;
Stylish way to store pairs of earrings, rings, necklaces, bracelets, watch, hair clips, hair accessories , etc with this jewelry organizer hanging storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars7,263 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
